title: A Deeper Dimension
description: An independent woman, a strong-willed man, and a love neither of them can deny.Diana needed no one. She’d survived on her own, put herself through school, and was totally self-sufficient. And now, at twenty-six, she had a successful career in the business world. And despite the fact that her new boss, Alex Mason was dynamic and attractive, she was determined to keep it strictly professional between them.But when unscrupulous business rivals threaten to destroy all that Alex has built, Diana finds herself falling for the hard-working man she discovers behind his formal façade. And the closer she gets to Alex, the farther she drifts from her hard-fought independence… This Retro Romance reprint was previously published in March 1984 by Harlequin Books.
author: Amanda Carpenter
